Welcome to the local wiki portal, powered by Quarto

Here you'll find pages on:

- Linux
- Programming
- Services & APIs
- Jupyter Notebooks
- Raspberry PIs
- And related things ...

Jump to other hosts:

- [MediaWiki](http://raspian.local/mw): collaborative pages
- [Blog](http://raspian.local/blog): blogdown postings
- [LibreChat](http://raspian.local:4080): local chat client
- [pitv](http://pitv.local:8080): PITV remote control
- [tvheadend](http://pitv.local:9080): DVB-T settings for pitv
- [pihole](http://pihole.local/admin/login): Configurations for local dns filtering
